posts.post_content:
what a pity that he's a monk and not a warrior like [Sosuke, Son of Seshiro](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sosuke, Son of Seshiro).  
this way he doesn't gain "combat-deathtouch".  
and, according to the picture, he should actually even be an archer. :P

posts.post_content: I'm surprised they haven't just errataed him to Snake Archer Monk, not like it matters much. A must-have in any snake deck. Makes Winged Coatl a 3/3 flash, flying, deathtouch. Empowers Lorescale Coatl for every extra draw you make. Turns Ohran Viper into an annoying 3/5 card fetcher. Etc, etc.

posts.post_content:
There's actually a lot of really good snakes in Magic...[Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra), [River Boa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=River Boa), [Mire Boa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mire Boa), [Mystic Snake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mystic Snake), etc.
  
So a Snake tribal deck actually looks pretty neat.
